analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusalattika saññojana gocchaka ādi
translated: The Dhamma-reversal, the Triad-duka Paṭṭhāna text🔽The Triad on the Wholesome, the Sphere of the Fetters, etc.

analyzed: na kusalam no saññojanam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With respect to a wholesome, not-a-fetter dhamma … (abbreviated) …

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ🔽noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa  na kusalam nogantham dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam noogham dhammam paṭicca pe  no yogam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusala
translated: With respect to cause, twenty-nine; with respect to object, twenty-four … with respect to nutriment, twenty-four … with respect to condition, twenty-nine.

With respect to a wholesome, not-a-bond dhamma … With respect to a wholesome, not-a-hindrance dhamma … With respect to a wholesome, not-a-clinging dhamma … With respect to a wholesome, not-a-conceit dhamma … With respect to a wholesome, not-a-destroyer dhamma … With respect to a wholesome, not-a-peril dhamma … With respect to a wholesome, not-a-obstacle dhamma … With respect to a wholesome, not-a-hindrance dhamma … (abbreviated) …

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: With respect to cause, twenty-nine; with respect to object, twenty-four … with respect to nutriment, twenty-four … with respect to condition, twenty-nine.
